name: it is what it is (Hedgy)
description:
'it is what it is' is a cozy, short, slice-of-life visual novel about your day off, which you spend hanging out with your friends and talking about life.

Made for NaNoRenO 2022 in the month of March 2022.
Contains some strong language.

Programming / Writing:
Hedgy - itch - twitter

Art:
TimeForSP - itch - twitter

Music:
Joshua Taipale - itch - twitter
